 2007-11282007-07-13,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of DAVID A. BROWN, Q.C., of Kettleby, Ontario, to the position of special advisor to the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness and to the President of the Treasury Board as Chair of the Task Force on Governance and Cultural Change in the RCMP, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on December 31, 2007.
